p: Microarray analysis was conducted at the Core Unit DNA Technologies (Core Facilities of the Faculty of Medicine; University of Leipzig). cRNA was prepared from 100 ng of total RNA hybridized to GeneChip Clariom S arrays (ThermoFisher Scientific) according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions. The arrays were scanned with a third-generation Affymetrix GeneChipScanner 3000.
